elements: Zachary Wakefield: a melancholy, but remorseless, inspector of police. He has recently been seconded to the Suppression Bureau.

This gentleman would much rather be left alone with his pipe and his Illustrated London News, but no, apparently some conjuror of abominations has to be hunted down like a mad dog, and apparently no-one else can find the time.
Zachary Wakefield: a melancholy, but remorseless, inspector of police. Let us be sure he dies in captivity.
This gentleman would much rather be left alone with his pipe and his Illustrated London News, but now he is mewed up in some wretched hole in the ground.
